short_summary: Request for Standing Offer - Line Painting Services
full_summary:
**W4M00-22C202 Line Painting Services**
=================================================================

**Document Information**

*   Reference Number: WS3568995953-Doc3676348369
*   Amendment Number: 0
*   Solicitation Number: WS3568995953
*   Publication Date: September 21, 2022
*   Tender Closing Date: October 4, 2022, 2:00 PM MDT
*   Expected Contract Start Date: None
*   Expected Contract End Date: August 7, 2024
*   Tender Status: Expired

**Procurement Details**

*   Procurement Category: CNST
*   Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Regions of Opportunity: None
*   Regions of Delivery: Winnipeg, Manitoba
*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   End-User Entities: Department of National Defence (DND)

**Project Description**

This Request for Standing Offer (RSO) is seeking a contractor to provide Line Painting Services for the Department of National Defence (DND) at the RP OPS Winnipeg: North Site – 17 Wing in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

The standing offer will be issued for a period of two (2) years with the option to extend for an additional three (3) one-year options.

**Key Service Requirements**

*   Provide all labour, tools, equipment, materials, transportation, and supervision for Line Painting Services
*   Complete work on an “as and when requested” basis by DND
*   Supply services at the following DND location: RP OPS Winnipeg: North Site – 17 Wing, Winnipeg, Manitoba

**Important Details**

*   A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation
*   Bidders must submit their required supporting documentation and bid submissions by October 4, 2022, 2:00 PM MDT
*   Late bids will be declared non-responsive

**Contact Information**

*   Contact Name: Matthew Virakorn
*   Contact Email: [matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice
